moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 4. d3 Nf6: This isn't the best move int the book.
moves.5... d5: I use the extra move to strike the center.
moves.6. exd5 Nxd5: He can pick up a pawn but...
moves.7. O-O: I had Nb4 planned making his pieces retreat to prevent a knight invasion.
moves.11. Nc3: This move was long overdue. Now it is bad.
moves.12. Nxd5: Here I had the last laugh.
moves.13. Nxc7+ Kd7: This was a slip of the mouse. I meant Kd8.
moves.15. Rxf1 f6: Now I will go after his knight.
moves.16. e4 Nd4: I take the time to get a home for my knight.
moves.18. Kf2 Nf4 19. Kg3 g5: I defend and entrench my knight.
moves.20. e5 fxe5 21. Kf3 Rf8: I set up a discovered attack.
moves.22. Ke4 Kd6 23. g3: ? But there weren't many other options.
moves.23... Bf5+: Another good move. Notice how his knight attacked.
moves.24. Ke3 Ng2+ 25. Ke2: ? Again there weren't many other options.
moves.25... Bxd3+ 26. Kxd3 Rxf1 27. c4 Rf8: Now I pick off the knight.
moves.28. c5+ Kc6 29. Ke4 Rxa8 30. Kxe5 Kxc5: I am now up a knight and a rook! He resigned.
